content: * please note that this listing is for the ad-free printable pdf version of this pattern you can find a free version of this pattern at theturtletrunk com and on the turtle trunk youtube channel * this crochet spa set pattern includes instructions for a thick and cozy headband and wristbands these work up quickly and easily and feature a beautiful texture created using only one crochet stitch this set is perfect for mother s day gifts difficulty best suited for an advanced beginner or higher sizes can be adjusted to be any size headband 20 x 4 wristband 7 5 x 3 supplies needed 60 yards of super bulky 6 weight yarn i used bernat blanket yarn 8 00mm l crochet hook yarn needle and scissors pattern includes - gauge pattern - link to free + full video tutorial - detailed instructions for a headband and wristband you are more than welcome to sell your finished items but please give the turtle trunk credit as pattern designer my patterns including all photographs are copyrighted you may not copy re-distribute or sell my pattern due to the electronic nature of this pattern we cannot offer refunds or exchanges
